s.x:
CURRENT SITUATION:
-Bardoan forces (Including Serick) are moving through Warberland from Selatis to Bardoran
-Many Bardoran Troops (of all kinds) and armored wagons being pulled by cows, horses, and oxen
- -some wagons contain stolen goods, others prisoners
- - they are being loaded onto Bardoran cargo ships to take them across the river, or closer to Thrun
- - -Bardoran sets up large lift systems to get wagons onto boats, The  cabin of he wagon can be seperated from the base with the wheels for easy transport
-many Thrun and Kortain Guards making deals with bardoran for slaves
- - some deals being made in Bardoran, others in Warberland

------------------------------------------------------
-Songbird witnesses her cousin get brutalized
- -After Songbird does a call, her cousin Fairbeak responds. The response is heard by some nearby guards and Mored Tongait. Tongait sees Fairbeak and commands for her to be brought out (Tongait has some keys). Two enforcers hold her arms on either side, one readies a whip behind her. Tongait stans in front of her with his arm raised
- -"We gave very simple instructions, don't try anything and you'll be all right. " he quickly brings his arm down, at which point Fairbeak is whipped. Tongait raises his arm again

- -" I don't speak chicken, but you only need to know two words of my language. Yes and Sir. Do you understand?" Fairbeak: (mumbles "yes sir"). Tongait signals for whip. "Whats that?" Fairbeak responds louder. Tongait: "Good. (To a nearby enforcer) Lets help it remember. tie it to that( points to a lampost), tie it's beak so it doesn't slip up again. (to an enforcer) keep watch over her" 

FREAXIR:
-Deiblen and other Professors have looked around the capital of Warberland
- - saw many Bardoran troops
- - saw Wagons with goods an prisoners
- - saw Bardoran making slave tradeswith Thrun and Kortain guards and officials

-Cain talks to Aurelius
- - Tells her to ask Ceydor about the {@item Compass of Garletor|CRDA} (Shrike actually has it)
- - Tells her about who Serick is, and what he did to Cain's Acolytes

-Ceydor talks to Krabmann
- -Gives him her First name
- - says she senses his loyalty and goodwill
- -gives him a glass ball, "This will offer aid when the time is right"
- -"I know you have felt a calling, your higher purpose will soon be revealed. You have great importance"

-Ceydor provides some help
- - gives them each three pecans that make the user invisible once the user eats it

ESCAPE:
-Mention Thunder of Bardoran
-Rasbo sees Romil Torrid

-Encounter: 2 Bardoran Scouts and 1 Bardoran enforcer who are looking for any prisoners that may have escaped

-Challenge: getting across the river
- - Party hides in a boat (could bring them across the river or even near thrun)
- -  party swims across (about a mile wide)
- - party floats in some barrels or other crates across
{could get run over by boats}
